column4: since a 6.06 -> 8.06 upgrade my computer seems to be switching to some resolution or refresh rate at some point at boot, even in safe mode. anything I can do?

when ctrl+alt+# doesn't give you a console, you most likely need to do a hard reboot. In single user mode (rescue mode) it never gives you extra consoles as it only has one.
